channel.title: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!
channel.description:
Hey there!
I'm working on a 562 right now and I was wondering how do i remove the barrows minigame? Because I'm trying to spawn just regular barrows npc so i can just kill them and get barrows part but it isnt working thjat way, the system think they are spawned within the minigame.
Thanks!

item.title: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

If you’re stuck trying to remove the shovel teleporting, just go to barrows, dig down, and get the exact coords where you’re teleported to. Search up those coords in your source and you should come up with something close to the method thats used to get you down there. Then just delete it or comment it out and add barrows monster to your spawnlist wherever you want them.

Read full topic
item.source: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!

item.title: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

Remove the method of digging with the spade, im not sure about 562, but try searching for inventoryoptionhandler.java or something like that, then where the dig method to get into barrows is, remove that
then spawn in the npc’s on the tops of the hills, and and drops to them.

Read full topic
item.source: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!

item.title: (562) Help, removing barrows minigame, and making it npc+spawn after death!
item.dc:creator: @Cesko_Bro Cesko Bro
item.description:
@Cesko_Bro wrote:

Why you want to remove minigame? the minigame is better than killing npc instead on the hill :palm:

Read full topic
